node.title: Does God Care?- Part 2
node.description: Does God hurt when I hurt? In part 2 we look at God’s experience in the great controversy and hear His side of the story. We primarily use Old Testament texts where God Himself is speaking to show that the God of the Old Testament is love, just like Jesus in the New Testament. By the conclusion of the message it should be clear that God hurts the most in the great controversy.
